predicate: The value of bwp-id from 129_270_bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config must be equal to the value of firstactiveuplinkbwp-id from 683_firstactiveuplinkbwp-id upon reconfiguration with reconfigurationWithSync
notes: The rule is derived from the explicit statement in the evidence that upon reconfiguration with reconfigurationWithSync, the network sets the firstActiveDownlinkBWP-Id and firstActiveUplinkBWP-Id to the same value.

meta.evidence: If configured for an SCell, this field contains the ID of the downlink bandwidth part to be used upon activation of an SCell. The initial bandwidth part is referred to by BWP-Id = 0. \\ Upon reconfiguration with reconfigurationWithSync, the network sets the firstActiveDownlinkBWP-Id and firstActiveUplinkBWP-Id to the same value.
